name: Gramma's Apple Bread Pudding
author: MESHEL
summary: This bread pudding is the ultimate in comfort food from Gramma's kitchen. It is great for using up bread and apples. Enjoy!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large bowl, combine bread, raisins, and apples
In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine 1 cup brown sugar, 1 3/4 cups milk, and 1/4 cup margarine
Cook and stir until margarine is melted
Pour over bread mixture in bowl
In a small bowl, whisk together cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, and eggs
Pour bread mixture into prepared dish, and pour egg mixture over bread
Bake in preheated oven 40 to 50 minutes, or until center is set and apples are tender
While pudding is baking, mix together sugar, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 1/2 cup milk, and 1/2 cup margarine in a saucepan
Bring to a boil, then remove from heat, and stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla
